channel.title: Need Help with footer
channel.description:
I can't seem to find a way to get my footer to stick on my website. If anyone will take a look at it and would be willing to fix it I will rep++ them
Link to site is [url=http://www.makemoneyinstantly.org]www.makemoneyinstantly.org[/url] Link to css is [url=http://www.makemoneyinstantly.org/layout/master.css]www.makemoneyinstantly.org/layout/master.css[/url]

Your site looks sexy

item.title: Need Help with footer
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

No, I need this http://ryanfait.com/sticky-footer/ But I can’t get it to work, let me try again.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 04:27:25 pm[/size][hr]Alright, once I finished fixing the footer, I added clear: both; it works on all pages. Thanks a bunch would have never thought of something so simple.

BTW what do you think of my site?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 04:51:54 pm[/size][hr]What the fuck I fucking hate internet explorer, and Idea how to get it to work in ie?

Error on my part, I had a height set at 400px; I removed it and now my website works in multiple browsers yes yes yes yes yes!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with footer

item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

some thing like

position: fixed;
bottom: 0;

?

item.title: Need Help with footer
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Thanks it worked.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 03:55:43 pm[/size][hr]Oh…now it doesn’t work on this page

It still doesn’t work when I look on large screen, how do I get it to stick to the bottom.

item.title: Need Help with footer

item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

try adding clear: both; to #footer
